titleStmt.title: The Agreement in doctrine among the dissenting ministers in London, subscribed Decemb. 16. 1692

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Cockerill ... and John Dunton ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
"Differences ... occasioned by a book written by Mr. Williams intituled Gospel truths stated and vindicated, and books written by Mr. Chauncey in opposition."
